name: Arc'teryx Atom LT Hoody - Women's
description:
An insulating layer for active pursuits. It warms your core and won't hold you back climbing, hiking or skiing. Lightweight insulation provides reliable warmth, feels weightless and is highly compressible. Layer it under a shell or wear it as your stand-alone jacket in cool weather.Tyono™ nylon shell is DWR treated for water resistance.Coreloft™ synthetic insulation is lightweight, breathable and warm.Air-permeable stretch fleece side panels.Underarm gussets and articulated elbows for range of motion.No Slip Zip™ front zip won't open accidentally.Improved cuffs for easy layering.Adjustable hem with slight drop in back.

        Sustainability
